entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 8:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: E 15 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
